verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Whenever I get to walking in the word I've heard,
Well, then my feet become like hind's feet , on the mountains
Of the Lord, and I go leaping o'er the mountains.
And I go skipping o'er the hills, I soar above the heavens
Like an eagle, o'er the mountains and the fields.
And I sing the songs of Zion, with a voice that's loud and sure.
And the chains I've known become stepping stones
Whenever I act upon God's Word
